offers.title: Effective Therapeutic Massage
offers.subtitle: Relieve pain and tension, bringing comfort and relaxation to your body.

offers.title: 24/7 Service
offers.subtitle: Always ready to serve you anytime, day or night.

offers.title: Affordable Pricing
offers.subtitle: Only $12 for 60 minutes. Enjoy truly relaxing moments with us.

features.title: Therapeutic Massage
features.description: Focused on treating specific issues such as back pain, neck pain, or stress

features.title: Relaxation Massage
features.description: Focused on reducing stress and providing deep relaxation

features.title: Sports Massage
features.description: Designed for athletes, helps muscle recovery and performance enhancement

features.title: Prenatal Massage
features.description: Specifically for pregnant women, helps relieve back pain and improve mood

services.title: Basic Package
services.description: Relieves pain and tension in the neck and shoulders

services.title: Standard Package
services.description: Reduces stress and provides full-body relaxation

services.title: Advanced Package
services.description: Uses essential oils for deep relaxation and soothing the body

services.title: Intensive Package
services.description: Improves blood circulation in the legs and reduces fatigue

feedbacks.name: Lee Hae Na
feedbacks.comment: 마사지가 정말 최고였어요! 정말 편안하고 상쾌한 기분이 들었어요. 강력히 추천합니다!

feedbacks.name: Nguyễn Văn An
feedbacks.comment: Lần đầu gọi massage tại nhà mà hài lòng hết sức! Nhân viên đến đúng giờ, tay nghề tốt, làm xong thấy nhẹ cả người.

feedbacks.name: Jason Wang
feedbacks.comment: 在家按摩的体验非常棒，技师专业又准时，服务很贴心。按完之后整个人都放松了，非常满意！一定会再次预约

feedbacks.name: Maria Rossi
feedbacks.comment: Great service and very professional staff!

feedbacks.name: James Miller
feedbacks.comment: Amazing home massage service! Super convenient, professional, and relaxing. Will definitely book again.

feedbacks.name: Eric Liu
feedbacks.comment: 第一次尝试上门按摩，超出我的预期！预约流程很方便，按摩师技术很好，服务也非常周到。在家就能享受专业的放松体验，真的太棒了

feedbacks.name: Kim Minji
feedbacks.comment: 집에서 받는 마사지, 정말 편하고 시원했어요! 또 이용하고 싶어요.

feedbacks.name: Trần Thị Mai
feedbacks.comment: Gọi thử massage tại nhà, ai ngờ mê luôn! Làm xong thấy thư giãn, ngủ ngon cả đêm.
